title: Harshith Mohan Kumar
text:
I’m Harshith, an aspiring Machine Learning/Computer Vision Engineer. I love to read, workout, play video games and partake in competitive activities.

Click here to learn more fun facts about me :)



University of California, Riverside | USA
MSCS | Sept 2023 - Present

PES University | India
B.Tech CS | Aug 2019 - June 2023




[08/07/23] - Extended abstract accepted at ICCV’23 BRAVO Workshop!
[07/20/23] - OCTraN now on ArXiv.
[05/29/23] - OCTraN paper accepted at CVPR’23 T4V Workshop!
[01/02/23] - Working as ML Intern at Intel!
[09/23/22] - Won Best Student Paper Award at ECML-PKDD’22 MLG workshop
